apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a tender kiss with a warm, rosy glow that speaks volumes of affection. The two figures, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, lean in with gentle intimacy, their faces softly illuminated by realistic lighting. The medium and dark skin tones are presented with nuanced depth and subtle highlights, making this a beautiful representation of love and connection across diverse relationships, perfect for expressing endearment in your digital conversations on Apple devices.
